arm_group.description: After each of the 3km time trial (3 in total), consumption of ribose incorporated in a sports drink.
After each of the 3km time trial (3 in total), consumption of placebo incorporated in a sports drink.

brief_summary.textblock:
Investigate the acute effect of ribose supplementation on performance and recovery in
      athletes.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Men and women

          -  Training volume > 7hrs/week

          -  VO2 max  > 40 and 45 mg/kg/min (for women and men respectively)

          -  Otherwise healthy individuals

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Pregnant or breastfeeding women

          -  Individuals with endocrine disorders, hypercholesterolemia, cardiovascular diseases,
             gut diseases, cancer, anemia, hypoglycemia

          -  Medication for lipids, diabetes, hypertension, inflammation, autoimmune diseases,
             mood disorders

          -  Excessive alcohol consumption (more than two drinks by day for men, one for women),
             smoking, drug use, supplements or natural products consumption during the study

intervention.description: After each of the 3km time trial (3 in total), participants will be asked to drink the experimental product (or placebo) incorporated in a sports drink.

clinical_study.official_title: The Effect of Ribose on Performance and Recovery in Athletes

other_outcome.description: Post-exercise fatigue perception on visual analog scale (VAS)
other_outcome.measure: Fatigue perception after each of the 3 consecutive 3km time trials on bike
Peak Vo2 consumption during each of the 3km time trials on bike

overall_official.affiliation: Institute on nutraceuticals and functional foods

primary_outcome.measure: Change in time to complete the third of 3 consecutive 3km time trials on bike

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: Performance measures: peak power (watts/kg), mean power (watts/kg), time to peak power (sec), total work (kJ) and maximum cadence (RPMmax)
secondary_outcome.measure: Performance on the 3 consecutive 3km time trials on bike

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Subject, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor), Primary Purpose: Prevention
